title: Farrukh hopes for PTI’s triumph in AJK polls
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP):Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib on Sunday expressed the hope that the Kashmiris would vote for Pakistan Tahreek-e Insaf (PTI) and ensure its victory in 11th general election of Azad Jammu and Kashmir (AJK).
گلگت بلتستان کی طرح کشمیر میں مودی کے یاروں کو  کرپشن، منی لانڈرنگ، جعلی اکائونٹس اور سرٹیفائیڈ جھوٹوں  کو بدترین شکست ہوگی۔#بلے_پہ_ٹھپہ https://t.co/euo0vKHs11
— Farrukh Habib (@FarrukhHabibISF) July 25, 2021
The minister, in a tweet, said like Gilgit-Baltistan, the people of AJK would also reject the cronies of Narendra Modi, corrupt, money launderers, fake accounts holders and ‘certified liars’ today.
He said Prime Minister Imran Khan had won the hearts of Kashmiris by becoming their ambassador and highlighting their case of right of self-determination at every international forum in the best possible way.
